disclaimerText.0: Please make sure you are eligible for getting your record cleared. If you need help with this please email placeholder@website.com.
disclaimerText.1: Be aware your statement is stored locally on your device, and never transmitted to our servers or any third-party
disclaimerText.2: This software is developed by a non-governmental third party, Code for America.
disclaimerText.3: Please also review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use before beginning.
disclaimerText.4: Please allocate at least 30 minutes of time to complete this.
disclaimerText.5: If at anytime you are confused please click the question mark button for guidance.
